item.description:
The Route 9 Rubyists meet again! We'll have free food and drink again for your enjoyment, so come on by after work and bring a friend! (just let me know about your +1/+2/etc. on the RSVP, please, so that we have enough food and drink for everyone)


This month, Blake Carlson will give a talk that should prove interesting and useful to Rubyists of all kinds:

Reusable Ruby: Awesomize your code with Modules and Active Support's concerns.

Are you concerned about making reusable Ruby code? In this talk we'll examine a few patterns for separating your code into Modules and dive deeper into ActiveSupport::Concern.
item.name: June 2012 Route 9 Ruby Meetup - "Reusable Ruby"
